name: Riseapps
tagline: Risk-free mobile and web development from scratch
description:
We develop mobile and web applications for startups and small/medium businesses. We strive to create innovative solutions, and we love working with emerging technologies, such as AR, VR, and IoT.    
 
We build our apps from scratch, covering design, coding, testing, and project management.
 
Since we work with all our clients remotely, we put extra emphasis on communication. Our developers are always available on Skype and Slack. Our project managers update our clients on the progress 3-5 times a week, using phone calls, Zoom, and Hangouts.  
 
For us, transparency is not just empty talk. We provide our clients with full access to our managing tools (Jira, Trello etc). There, they can track all project tasks and see how much time was spent on each task. Because we want you to feel in control.
 
Our main technology stack includes:   
• Swift & Objective-C for iOS   
• Java & Kotlin for Android   
• React Native for cross-platform apps   
• Vue & React for frontend web development   
• NodeJs, Laravel & Django for backend web development
 
 
We mostly work on:
• Healthcare solutions   
• Fitness services   
• Social platforms   
• On-demand services (SaaS)   
• CRMs for businesses.   
• IoT systems
